homePageProjects.title: Replatforming A Leading British Retailer
homePageProjects.summary: Architecture, Accessibility, UX/UI Design, Front-End Development
intro: As high street retailers continue to struggle, one company continues to buck the trend.
Here's how Next look to revolutionise their online service through creating a progressive platform for themselves and their partners to thrive.

homePageProjects.title: Using A Mixed Reality Game To Map Customer Experiences
homePageProjects.summary: User Research, Persona Development, Experience Design
intro: How I designed a product through utilising key teacher values in relation to education technology, and how used a mixed reality game to map their experiences.
